result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey F. Karlinsky was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jeffrey F. Karlinsky is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jeffrey F. Karlinsky was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
On Count #2:
The Court sentences the Defendant to pay a fine of $500+ costs = $1,083 to be paid in $100 per month installments commencing on 6/1/16 and on the first day of each month thereafter until paid in full. Non-payment shall result in a 10 day jail term, with Huber privileges consecutive.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey F. Karlinsky

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements and Criminal Case Settlement Attached

Reserve Judge Neal Nettesheim presiding for Branch IV: 

Case called at 1:20pm[mo]
Defendant Jeffrey F. Karlinsky in court with Attorney Andrew Robert Griggs.   ADA Monica Hall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Maximum penalties recited; Constitutional rights given; plea of " NO CONTEST " entered on Count #2; factual basis stipulated; victim rights compliance verified; the Court accepts plea, finds Defendant guilty, and orders Judgment of Conviction entered.

Sentencing arguments given by Counsel
Statement made by Mr. Karlinsky

On Motion of the State, the Court reads in and dismisses: Count #1

On Count #2:
The Court sentences the Defendant to pay a fine of $500+ costs = $1,083 to be paid in $100 per month installments commencing on 6/1/16 and on the first day of each month thereafter until paid in full. Non-payment shall result in a 10 day jail term, with Huber privileges consecutive.

0 days credit
recess: 1:38pm

Case called at 2:45 pm [Clerk SH]
Defendant Jeffrey F. Karlinsky in court with Attorney Andrew Robert Griggs. ADA Theresa A Beck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Service of Complaint admitted; reading waived.
Plea of "not guilty" entered; speedy trial waived by the Defendant
Mr. Karlinsky indicates that his date of birth is: 10-4-1966

Court requires a $1000 signature bond, with conditions: 
-No acts or threats of violence towards any persons 
-No contact with Brett Grulke
-Booking at JCSD
Recess: pm
